function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Gender disparity in covid-19 knowledge","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low representation of women in the study may skew the results and impact the generalizability of findings.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of misinformation about covid-19 among participants may lead to incorrect beliefs and behaviors regarding the disease.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low mean covid-19 prevention and mitigation knowledge in specific socio-demographic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of clinical features, signs, and symptoms of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and validity.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using online methods to collect data during a stay-at-home regulation period.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restricting participation to indonesian residents living overseas.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate public attitudes and .","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accommodation of active mobility as alternative commute modes may impact urban resilience to
